title: Ranked Team
body: With the founding of Light Years, a new gaming company who plans to launch its first game very fast wants to grow the company.  Light Years is making a new ranked team within League of Legends.  The players on the team will receive RP after a certain amount of time.  Please add me on League of Legends if interested in joining.  The team especially needs high golds and above but if lower still contact me @SquidMan00 on League of Legends.

replies.body: I'll Join.Currently 1 game away from silver 3.was gold 2 in my main account.I got more knowledge about the game than an avarage player in platinum and my knowledge can be compared to diamonds.I can teach the team stuff that we could use to win and i know how to shotcall. Add me at @TeamSoloFeeder on League

> [{quoted}](name=FIamingIronDiIdo,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=34pv5gvE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-30T17:06:36.068+0000)
>
> bro your bronze 4....

I'm not on the team.  I will give captain to best player. This account was bought so we could start a ranked team.
